content: Hey, I need to persist some data between two LateLintPasses, what's the best way to do that?
I think I may have figured it out, or, at least the impl_lint_pass! macro may be the answer (instead of a declare_lint_pass! macro)
that'll do if you just need to store data on one LateLintPass object. Sharing between two pass objects is more complex.
Yeah, I figured it out and ended up with a global lazy mutex that stores the data.
Disconnect3d has marked this topic as resolved.
